data.message: Anyone who says Eminem fell off is oviously retarded.  Mmlp2 was one of his best lyrical albums. The production was one of the worst so that's how u know that a lot of people only care for beats and not words that's why mumble rap is so popular because society has been dumbed down..lyrically no one comes close to Eminem. .just keep listening to songs without words and shut the hell up because you clearly don't know real music. ..

replies.message: Tell em..they don't know real hip hop...poetry...now at days they can throw something on a beat and people like it...someone that actually has something to say gets bashed about it. His music has helped me stay strong Eminem G.O.A.T
Exactly!  Loved him on SNL tonight. Felt like he was keeping it real talking about who he really is and how he feels.
Yeah bro no one can match em lyrically ....those people listen to Lil pump who are saying that the Beats are not good
Anyone who uses “retarded” as a derogatory term is either ignorant or an asshole.  Which one are you?
They're not retarded, they're just Trump supporters.
I'm younger then you Todd my slang is different. That's all.
But u r clearly an as hole tho
YEEEESSSSS yes yes yes yes. IMO Bad Guy is one of the most genius songs he’s ever done.
Todd Melton anyone who uses ignorant or an asshole as a derogatory term is a retard
listen to Em his a genius lyrically good literature great poetry i feel like No music is Greater than Em

"just keep listening to songs without words and shut the hell up because you clearly don't know real music. .."

Not saying mumble rap has any reason to exist, but classical music doesn't have words either, so that's kind of a weak reason to say someone doesn't like "real music."
Seven Martinez think he maybe just referring to hip hop in general.
Steven you know what I meant! I love classical and the music that is in movies. Like epic orchastra stuff. But yeah I was talking about hip hop lol

Yes, Eminem is a lyrical genius. But wouldn't it be better if he used better instrumentals to deliver his lyrics? Remember that music consists on rythm too. I would love to hear Eminem on a Premier, Alchemist or 9th wonder production

For sure. I went to school for production.  Beats for sure make the song AL OR better. I hate to admit even I sometimes pass over a song if the best is not good. Not saying I will not go back and listen to the great lyrics.  Both are VERY important.
